feed.title: Why is deriving public key from the signature not used in Segwit?

entry.title: Why is deriving public key from the signature not used in Segwit?
entry.summary: In an email discussion, Aymeric Vitte raised a query regarding the presence of pubkey for standard p2pkh transactions, which was not the case previously. However, there was no response to his question regarding the reason behind this change and when it was implemented. In response, the sender of the email refuted the existence of such behavior in the first place and stated that Vitte might be mistaken.
